title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat and embedding wrappers to the LangChain framework.

title: llama-index-integrations-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration letting you use any Ollama model as a query or chat engine backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI that wraps Ollama for chatting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embeddings, and model management in Spring/Android apps.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community scripts to convert HuggingFace models into Ollama Modelfile format.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Open-source Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for integration testing with LLMs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama providing idiomatic client methods and model management.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: ChatGPT retrieval plugin adapter that uses Ollama embeddings for local document search.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-served registry browser to discover and share custom Modelfiles and quantized models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package wrapping Ollama’s REST API for macOS/iOS apps with SwiftUI example.
